citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the USDA inspector observed enrichment items within the enclosure; however, the
environmental enhancement program was not available for inspection. An environmental enhancement plan that
documents the appropriate provisions to provide enrichment and special considerations (such as single-housed non-
human primates and infants) must be directed by the attending veterinarian and available for inspection. This is necessary
to ensure the psychological well-being of the animals. Ensure that a documented plan for environmental enrichment that
addresses the required elements is maintained and available for inspection
Correct by June 8 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
At the time of inspection, the USDA inspector observed enrichment items within the enclosure; however, the 
environmental enhancement program was not available for inspection. An environmental enhancement plan that 
documents the appropriate provisions to provide enrichment and special considerations (such as single-housed non-
human primates and infants) must be directed by the attending veterinarian and available for inspection. This is necessary 
to ensure the psychological well-being of the animals. Ensure that a documented plan for environmental enrichment that 
addresses the required elements is maintained and available for inspection 
Correct by June 8 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
